Quobyte | Santa Clara, Berlin or Remote | Full-time | Remote | https://www.quobyte.com/ Quobyte is a high-performance distributed parallel POSIX file system designed to handle a broad range of workloads from classic HPC and ML to VMs and databases. Our customers include Fortune 500 companies, research institutes, and innovative SaaS companies.

We are looking for self-starters that can help our customers size and deploy Quobyte on prem and in the cloud, integrate with kubernetes or OpenStack and support them running their diverse applications on Quobyte.

We are currently looking for: Sales Engineer/Architect EMEA - UK or Germany Sales Engineer/Architect US - Chicago or New York

For detailed job descriptions please visit https://www.quobyte.com/careers.

Send your CV to work@quobyte.com.
